tool.name: regcoil
tool.command: cp '$regcoil_input' 'regcoil_in.reactor' && cp '$vmec_output' 'wout_regcoil_out.reactor.nc' && sed -i "/wout_filename/c\ wout_filename = 'wout_regcoil_out.reactor.nc'" regcoil_in.reactor && regcoil regcoil_in.reactor && cp regcoil_out.reactor.nc '$regcoil_output' && cp nescin.out '$nescin_output'
tool.help: Regcoil runs VMEC and BNORM simulations using the provided input file. Rename the output to 'regcoil_out.reactor.nc' for post-processing. For issues, refer to regcoil documentation or contact support.
